channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump voters feel very differently about things now that he’s won, our new poll shows

item.description: Find insight on Disney, Raspberry Pi, TSMC, Tencent and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Social-Media Companies Decide Content Moderation Is Trending Down
item.description: Meta follows in X’s footsteps by letting users fact-check each other with “Community Notes.”

item.title: Biden says he could have beaten Trump if he had stayed in the election
item.description: Polls showed Biden falling behind Trump before he stepped aside, and that he lost ground after a shaky debate performance in June.

item.title: Live updates: Trump to huddle with Senate Republicans on early legislative strategy
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and the new Congress.

item.title: 2024 turnout is near the 2020 record. See how each state compares.
item.description: Votes are still being counted in some states, but those tabulated so far and expected totals show a range of turnout across states.

item.title: Biden: Trump’s tax and tariffs plans are a ‘major mistake’
item.description: Five weeks after the election, the president took his sharpest swing at Trump’s policy plans.
